GOEMON

Business hours

Take away

[vc_column_text]

 

Open for Dinner: Tuesday – Sunday

5:30 pm to late

Open for Lunch: Saturday & Sunday

12 noon to 2:00 pm (L/O)
Closed: Monday


* Pickup time can be selected at least 30 mins later from current time for preparation
* Advance online payment required
* Cancellation fee will charged 100% before pickup time and no show

You can use following payment and credit card[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image=”1901″ alignment=”center”]

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″]

GOEMON

[vc_column_text]

281 Glen Huntly Rd Elsternwick, VIC 3185, Australia
